mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_feed (location, ctnt, iuser) VALUES (#{location}, #{ctnt}, #{iuser})
mapper.select: SELECT a.ifeed,a.location, a.ctnt, a.iuser, a.regdt ,b.ifeedimg, b.img, c.nm AS writer, c.mainProfile, C.mainProfile FROM t_feed a LEFT JOIN t_feed_img b ON a.ifeed = b.ifeed INNER JOIN t_user c ON a.iuser = c.iuser ORDER BY a.ifeed DESC
SELECT a.ifeed,a.location, a.ctnt, a.iuser, a.regdt , c.nm AS writer, c.mainProfile FROM t_feed a INNER JOIN t_user c ON a.iuser = c.iuser ORDER BY a.ifeed DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{limit}
SELECT ifeedimg, ifeed, img FROM t_feed_img WHERE ifeed = #{ifeed}
